summary: Rivian plans to use its AI and Autonomy Day to unveil its full product roadmap and AI strategy . CEO RJ Scaringe noted, The metaphorical plumbing for training our AI driving models is in place . Wedbush's Dan Ives kept an Outperform rating, praising Rivian's transformative vision and upcoming R2 .  Investors will be watching for concrete demos, performance benchmarks and customer- usage metrics at the fall Autonomy Day . Goldman's Mark Delaney stayed Neutral but highlighted Rivian's strong electrical architecture and software stack as foundations for long-term profit growth through autonomy and services .
